DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - To develop serum proteomic classifier use matrix-assisted laser-desorption/ionization time-of-flight mass spectrometry analysis blood sample patient non-squamous cell non-small cell lung cancer predict benefit , term survival time progression , treatment bevacizumab combination carboplatin paclitaxel . Secondary - To better quantitate candidate biomarkers use advanced mass spectrometric technology , include multiple-reaction monitoring heavy-labeled peptide . OUTLINE : Previously collect pre-treatment sample serum plasma randomly select patient enrol protocol ECOG-4599 ( i.e. , 60 bevacizumab arm 30 control arm ) . Samples analyze matrix-assisted laser-desorption/ionization time-of-flight mass spectrometry identify pattern protein spectra correlate patient survival .
